ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Yes. Learned a ton and how to better think through these issues.
I would recomend it to all classmates interested in social movements as well as classmates interested in the Middle East region.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This course proved very insightful in thinking through some of the major theoretical issues facing anyone studying social movements- especially religious ones. It was very helpful in giving me ideas for future study. I also have benefited from each of the case studies looked at each week.

It gave me completely new and insiring approaches on how to treat many *terrorist* groups in today's world. If merely a fractrion off policymakers could have had the opportunity to participate in such a class, I am sure that the world would have been much more capable in deeling with such groups.
